name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - U & V  | 10 Questions

questions.text: There are three Uncle Sam the bears, but what colors do they come in?
questions.correct: White, dark brown, and light brown
questions.explanation:
White, dark brown, and light brown.

	The dark brown Uncle Sam bear has a red nose, red and white striped feet, and a red white and blue bow.  The white bear has a red white and blue bow, a blue nose, and red feet with stars on them.  The light brown bear has a red white and blue bow, a white nose, and blue feet with stars on them.  They all own the same poem. "Each year on the fourth of JulyAs fireworks light up the skyWith all my friends and familyWe'll celebrate that we are free!"

questions.text: What is the major difference between Union and Union the USA exclusive?
questions.correct: The USA exclusive has a flag on his nose.
options: Union has a flag on his nose.
The USA exclusive has a red, white, and blue bow.
Union has a red, white, and blue bow.
questions.explanation:
The USA exclusive has a flag on his nose.

	Both bears are the same, each baby blue with a bunch of American flags on the body, and each has a red, white, and blue bow.  However, Union the USA exclusive also has an American flag on the nose. "We look to our flag with prideAll across the countrysideThe Stars & Stripes will always beA symbol of our liberty!"

questions.text: What color is Unity the Europe exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	Unity the bear is a symbol of the European Union.  He is a blue bear with a gold bow.  On his chest there is a circle of 12 gold stars. "The EU finally came to beThat's why I'm named UnityOur countries now unite as oneA brand new era has begun!"

questions.text: We now will move on to V.  What kind of animal is Valor?
questions.explanation:
Eagle.

	Valor is a bald eagle.  He wears a medal around his neck. "To honor all of those who servePatriot Day we do observeFor the bravery you've displayedYour memory will never fade!"

questions.text: Which of these is a monkey?
questions.explanation:
Valentine.

	Valentino and Valentina are both Valentine's Day bears.  Valentini does not exist.  Valentine is a red monkey which a white bow with hearts on it. "Please let me be your ValentineAnd say to me that you'll be mineI will be forever trueEspecially to a friend like you!"

questions.text: What kind of flower is on Vanda's chest?
questions.explanation:
Lilac.

	Vanda is a Singapore exclusive.  He is all blue with a blue nose, and has a pink lilac on his chest.  He wears a blue and gold bow. "Like a flower I was bornLilac is my shade in early mornMountains and fields through I may roamSingapore is my native home!"

questions.text: What kind of animal is Vegas?
questions.explanation:
Zebra.

	Fortunately, there is no Beanie Baby that is a kumquat, which is not even an animal!  Vegas is a zebra, not to be confused with LAS Vegas the bear.  Vegas is a dark purple, light purple, blue, orange, and yellow zebra. "Most other zebras are black and whiteBut that's not me, I'm quite a sightWith such bright colors I'm sure to beThe funkiest zebra you'll ever see!"

Carrot.

	Veggies is a rabbit, and rabbits like to eat carrots!  So Veggies holds an orange carrot with green leaves.  Veggies also has orange polka dots in her ears. "In the garden's where I'll beSearching for a treat for meMaybe just a carrot or two If there's more, I'll share with you!"

Black.

	There may be a song called "Blue Velvet," but Velvet is black!  She is a black panther, which is a type of leopard.  Black panthers actually do have leopard spots, but they are so faint and so similar to the fur you can barely see them unless you are very close. "Velvet loves to sleep in the treesLulled to dreams by the buzz of beesShe snoozes all day and plays all night Running and jumping in the moonlight!"

Yellow.

	Victory the bear is an Olympic bear.  He is all yellow with a yellow bow and has leaves around his head, just like the ancient Greeks wore in the first Olympic Games!  He also has an Olympic torch on his chest. "Always strive to do your bestAnd put your heart into the questWith a drive you can't denyYou can reach the highest high!"
